evidence.text: NOTICE OF APPEAL TO DC CIRCUIT COURT by SCOTT BESSENT, SERGIO GOR, KAREN GORMAN, KARL KAMMANN, DONALD J. TRUMP, RUSSELL VOUGHT.

extracted.value: Appeal: Scott Besse, Sergio Gor, Karen Gorman, Karl Kammann, Donald J. Trump, and Russell Vought appealed to DC Circuit Court.

evidence.text: ORDER granting 2 plaintiff's motion for a temporary restraining order. It is HEREBY ORDERED that from the date of entry of this order until the Court rules on the request for a preliminary injunction, Hampton Dellinger shall continue to serve as the Special Counsel of the Office of the Special Counsel. Defendants may not deny him access to the resources or materials of that office or recognize the authority of any other person as Special Counsel. In light of this order, the administrative stay entered on February 10, 2025, Minute Order (Feb. 10, 2025), is hereby VACATED.

extracted.value: Court granted plaintiff's Motion for Temporary Restraining Order, ordering defendants to allow Hampton Dellinger to continue as Special Counsel until the preliminary injunction ruling, vacating the administrative stay issued on February 10, 2025.

evidence.text: ORDER denying 16 defendants' motion to stay. See Order for details.

extracted.value: Court denied defendants' Motion to Stay the Temporary Restraining Order, stating the motion was moot as the TRO was already granted.

evidence.text: MINUTE ORDER denying 18 Motion to Intervene. Movant has not made a showing that he satisfies the requirements to intervene as of right under Fed. R. Civ. Proc. 24(a)...

extracted.value: Court denied defendants' Motion to Intervene, finding the movant did not meet requirements for intervention as of right or permissive intervention.

evidence.text: ORDER denying 22 defendants' motion for summary judgment and granting 23 plaintiff's cross-motion for summary judgment and granting declaratory and injunctive relief.

extracted.value: Court denied defendants' Motion for Summary Judgment and granted plaintiff's Cross-Motion for Summary Judgment and Permanent Injunction, issuing declaratory and injunctive relief.

evidence.text: COMPLAINT against SCOTT BESSENT, SERGIO GOR, KAREN GORMAN, KARL KAMMANN, DONALD J. TRUMP, RUSSELL VOUGHT ( Filing fee $ 405 receipt number ADCDC-11468025) filed by HAMPTON DELLINGER.

extracted.value: Hampton Dellinger filed a Complaint against Scott Besse, Sergio Gor, Karen Gorman, Karl Kammann, Donald J. Trump, and Russell Vought, alleging that the termination of his position as Special Counsel violated 5 U.S.C. § 1211(b), seeking declaratory and injunctive relief.

evidence.text: MOTION for Temporary Restraining Order Request for Emergency Hearing by HAMPTON DELLINGER.

extracted.value: Hampton Dellinger filed a Motion for Temporary Restraining Order requesting emergency relief to maintain his position as Special Counsel pending the court's ruling on a preliminary injunction, with a hearing held on February 10, 2025.

evidence.text: MOTION for Leave to Appear Pro Hac Vice :Attorney Name- Kate L. Doniger, Filing fee $ 100, receipt number ADCDC-11468271. Fee Status: Fee Paid. by HAMPTON DELLINGER.

extracted.value: Hampton Dellinger filed a Motion for Leave to Appear Pro Hac Vice for attorney Kate L. Doniger, seeking permission to represent him in the case.

evidence.text: MOTION for Leave to Appear Pro Hac Vice :Attorney Name- Benjamin Stern, Filing fee $ 100, receipt number ADCDC-11468322. Fee Status: Fee Paid. by HAMPTON DELLINGER.

extracted.value: Hampton Dellinger filed a Motion for Leave to Appear Pro Hac Vice for attorney Benjamin Stern, seeking permission to represent him in the case.

evidence.text: NOTICE OF APPEAL TO DC CIRCUIT COURT by SCOTT BESSENT, SERGIO GOR, KAREN GORMAN, KARL KAMMANN, DONALD J. TRUMP, RUSSELL VOUGHT. Fee Status: No Fee Paid. Parties have been notified.

extracted.value: Defendants filed a Notice of Appeal to the DC Circuit Court challenging the court's order granting the Temporary Restraining Order, with the appeal docketed as USCA Case Number 25-5025.

evidence.text: MOTION for Summary Judgment by SCOTT BESSENT, SERGIO GOR, KAREN GORMAN, KARL KAMMANN, DONALD J. TRUMP, RUSSELL VOUGHT.

extracted.value: Defendants filed a Motion for Summary Judgment seeking dismissal of the Complaint, with the motion due on February 21, 2025.

evidence.text: Cross MOTION for Summary Judgment, MOTION for Permanent Injunction by HAMPTON DELLINGER.

extracted.value: Hampton Dellinger filed a Cross-Motion for Summary Judgment and Permanent Injunction seeking to uphold his position as Special Counsel, with the motion due on February 24, 2025.

extracted.value: Defendants filed a Notice of Appeal to the DC Circuit Court challenging the court's order granting summary judgment and permanent injunction, with the appeal docketed as USCA Case Number 25-5052.

evidence.text: MOTION to Stay re 33 Order on Motion for Summary Judgment,,,, Order on Motion for Permanent Injunction, by SCOTT BESSENT, SERGIO GOR, KAREN GORMAN, KARL KAMMANN, DONALD J. TRUMP, RUSSELL VOUGHT.

evidence.text: Minute Entry for Preliminary Injunction proceedings held on 2/26/2025 before Judge Amy Berman Jackson. Arguments heard and taken under advisement.
